steps: Navigate to Settings > Leave > Leave Policies
Configure salary calculation method (Basic salary, Basic + Allowance)
Add eligible employees to the policy
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary policy is created and employees are assigned to it

steps: Review pending requests in the Pending tab
View request details for each employee
Check eligibility based on leave salary policy
Choose action: Approve, Reject, or Add to Payroll Table
Optionally overwrite the amount if needed
Add remarks to explain any adjustments
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary requests are processed and moved to appropriate status (Approved, Rejected, or Added to Payroll)

steps: Determine leave period for the employee
Calculate prorated salary based on working day settings
Update payroll table with leave salary amount
Filter employees by 'leave salary' in payroll table
Generate Variable Pay File (VPF) if required
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary is correctly processed in payroll with proper calculations and adjustments

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave salary requests spanning multiple leave cycles require separate approvals
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: When an employee's leave spans two different leave cycles, the system generates two separate leave salary requests that must each be approved independently. Verify all pending leave salary requests to avoid overlooking related approvals.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave salary requests cannot start before the current payroll cycle
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Split the leave request into two separate requests aligned with each payroll cycle when leave spans across closed and active payroll cycles.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave salary policy assignment timing affects eligibility
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Employees must be assigned to a leave salary policy before creating a leave request for the leave salary to be calculated. If policy is assigned after request creation, the leave request must be deleted and recreated.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave Salary Accrual Report lacks customization options
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: The report currently cannot be customized for sorting, formatting, or additional columns. Use Excel for post-download modifications.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Currency label on leave salary landing page may not match company's configured currency
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Ignore the default currency label on the landing page. Actual leave salary requests will use the correct company currency.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave salary report download issues for specific staff members
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: Access the report via Payroll table > Reports instead of the direct leave salary report download.

what_to_watch_out_for.known_issue: Leave salary breakdown lacks month-by-month allocation for multi-month leave requests
what_to_watch_out_for.workaround: The system currently shows only total days calculated against the salary formula, without breaking down days by month.
